Posts.EditableText:
Hi

I've been running through the tutorial on the wiki, and found this problem:

how do you make it that after an object is picked up, if it has a use command set, that when the object hyperlink is clicked it displays the use command on the drop down box. I know if you click it on the inventory you can get the use command.

for example in the tutorial, you take the defibrillator and it goes in your inventory , but then when you click on the defibrillators hyperlink again you do not have the option for use.

am i missing something? 

thanks in advance.
